description: Welcome Sascha Sin whose hot sister, Samantha Sin, introduced her to fuckingmachines. Sascha is skeptical but willing which is saying a lot since before today, she had never even used a vibrator. After two intense orgasms, Sascha decides she'd rather stick to humans. Can't win them all over! Thanks for trying, Sascha. Enjoy this weekend bonus.
title: WEEKEND BONUS UPDATE - a little blond ambition to get you through the weekend.
